name: imaginably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is possible to imagine: That cannot imaginably happen. This might imaginably be possible within the institution's current system.
More examplesFewer examplesIn this context, the law could, imaginably, impose penalties upon individuals merely because of their race.Imaginably, symptoms vary from person to person.This situation could imaginably have serious financial consequences for students and their families.She's an artist who wants to take art beyond the limits of what art can imaginably do.
